seo.title: Editorial Workflow with TinaCMS
seo.description: Efficiently manage and review your team's content changes through an integrated Git workflow.

blocks.headline: Editorial Workflow
blocks.text: Review, approve, and manage content changes with version control

features.headline: Branching
features.text: Create content on new branches without going to GitHub.

features.headline: Protect Branches
features.text: Prevent editing on specific branches. When attempting to save to a protected branch, content editors will be prompted to create a new branch instead.

features.headline: Merge With Confidence
features.text: A Pull Request is automatically created when a content editor creates a new branch.  This also allows teams to ensure that their CI/CD workflow all passes before merging content into production.

features.headline: Shareable Previews
features.text: Easily get to your preview on Netlify, Vercel, AWS, etc. This allows editors to easily share their site preview with other stakeholders.

blocks.headline: Get a demo
blocks.text: Tina's editorial workflow is only available on the Business and Enterprise plans. Contact us for a demo.
